home.message.firsttitle:
chairman message

Eng: mohammed reda

fpico chairman

success is an endless journey, achieved through persistence

our goals is to create a clear vision for the future while developing our present. yesterday, we started with one project, today, we have a range of major government and private projects built on solid foundations

we aim to expand globally by implementing the latest administrative systems in managing facilities and operations, both locally and regionally

fibco has entered a crucial phase, driven by the kingdom’s growth, setting new standards in contracting as a model for others. we remain committed to our vision, aligned with saudi arabia’s 2030 vision under the guidance of our wise government
